courses.title: Introduction to React
courses.description: Learn the basics of React and how to build web applications using this popular JavaScript library.

courses.title: Advanced React Techniques
courses.description: Take your React skills to the next level with this advanced course on advanced techniques like server-side rendering and hooks.

courses.title: React Native Fundamentals
courses.description: Discover how to build cross-platform mobile apps using React Native, a powerful and popular framework for mobile development.

courses.title: Node.js for Beginners
courses.description: Learn how to build scalable and efficient server-side applications using Node.js, a popular and powerful JavaScript runtime.

courses.title: Advanced Node.js Concepts
courses.description: Take your Node.js skills to the next level with this advanced course on topics like concurrency, event loops, and memory management.

courses.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the basics of JavaScript and learn how to build web applications and interactive user interfaces using this powerful programming language.
